person.persName: William Herrin (Fulton County, Kentucky, farmer and sheriff)

body.p: Fulton County, Kentucky, farmer and sheriff. Kentucky native. Married Emaline Herrin. Father of Matthew Herrin, Elizabeth Herrin, Mary M. Herrin, Dorcus J. Herrin, and Sarah C. Herrin. Farmer in Fulton County in 1850 and 1860. Owned one enslaved person in 1850. Sheriff of the Fulton County Court from 1861 to 1868.
